Translations.Text: Niscaya yara bisbasa sthapana kare ebam satkarma kare, allaha taderake dakhila karabena udyana samuhe, yara taladesa diye nirjharinisamuha prabahita habe. Taderake tathaya sbarna-kankana o mukta dbara alankrta kara habe ebam tathaya tadera posaka habe resami.
Tara pathapradarsita hayechila satbakyera dike ebam paricalita hayechila prasansita allahara pathapane.

Yara kuphara kare o allahara pathe badha srsti kare ebam se'i masajide harama theke badha deya, yake ami prastuta karechi sthaniya o bahiragata sakala manusera jan'ye samabhabe ebam ye masajide harame an'yayabhabe kona dharmadrohi kaja karara icacha kare, ami taderake yantranadayaka sasti asbadana karaba.
